name: HALUNAZI
description: HALLUNAZI is a simple fps with endless random level generation. Player gains score for every room he completes. The end goal of the game is to complete as much rooms as possible.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 14 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 and higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 14 GB available space
